issue.title: [Python] Deprecate the legacy pyarrow.filesystem interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9645](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9645). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `pyarrow.filesystem` interfaces are dubbed "legacy" (in favor of `pyarrow.fs`), but at some point we should actually deprecate (and eventually remove) them. 

There is probably still some work to do before that: ensure the new filesystems can be used instead in all places (eg in pyarrow.parquet), improve the docs about the new filesystems, ..
